Method Detail

addHouse

public boolean addHouse()
Adds houses to the current number of houses on the property.

Parameters:
x - an integer number of houses to add
Returns:
a boolean checking whether it's possible to add more houses

getColor

public Colors getColor()
Gets the color group (as an integer) of the property.

Returns:
the integer property group number

getHouses

public int getHouses()
Gets the number of houses on the property.

Returns:
the integer number of houses

getMortgage

public boolean getMortgage()
Gets whether or not the property is mortgaged.

Returns:
A boolean of whether it's mortgaged or not

getOwned

public boolean getOwned()
gets the current availability of the property.

Returns:
a boolean, true = owned, false = not owned

getOwner

public Player getOwner()
gets the current owner of the property

Returns:
the player currently owning the property

getPrice

public int getPrice(int i)
Gets whichever price is at the parametered index.

Parameters:
i - an integer index variable to go to that spot in the prices array
Returns:
an integer, some monetary cost unique to the property

getPriceArray

public int[] getPriceArray()
Gets the whole array of prices associated with the property.

Returns:
an int array of all the prices

getWorth

public int getWorth()
Gets the worth of the property, including houses. Dependent on mortgaged or not.

Returns:
The integer worth of the property

payRent

public int payRent()
Gets the amount the player landing on the property must pay as rent.

Returns:
An integer amount they must pay

Sets the Color group this property belongs to.

Parameters:
color - The String to be the new color of the property

                     int price)

Parameters:
i - The integer index point for in the price array
price - The integer price to have it set to

subtractHouse

public boolean subtractHouse()
Subtracts houses from the current number of houses on the property.

Parameters:

Returns:
